Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.springframework.kafka.test.rule.KafkaRule
    since 2.2 in favor of EmbeddedKafkaRule
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.springframework.kafka.support.serializer.ErrorHandlingDeserializer
    in favor of ErrorHandlingDeserializer2.
    org.springframework.kafka.test.rule.KafkaEmbedded
    since 2.2 in favor of EmbeddedKafkaRule
    org.springframework.kafka.support.ProducerListenerAdapter
    as the ProducerListener has default methods and can be implemented directly without the need for this adapter
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.springframework.kafka.support.serializer.JsonDeserializer.DEFAULT_KEY_TYPE
    in favor of JsonDeserializer.KEY_DEFAULT_TYPE
    org.springframework.kafka.support.serializer.JsonDeserializer.DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE
    in favor of JsonDeserializer.VALUE_DEFAULT_TYPE
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.springframework.kafka.test.rule.KafkaEmbedded.bounce(int)
    org.springframework.kafka.test.rule.KafkaEmbedded.bounce(int, boolean)
    org.springframework.kafka.test.utils.KafkaTestUtils.consumerProps(String, String, KafkaEmbedded)
    since 2.2 in favor of KafkaTestUtils.consumerProps(String, String, EmbeddedKafkaBroker)
    org.springframework.kafka.core.DefaultKafkaConsumerFactory.createKafkaConsumer(String, String, String)
    org.springframework.kafka.transaction.KafkaTransactionManager.getResourceFactory()
    - in a future release KafkaAwareTransactionManager will not be a sub interface of ResourceTransactionManager. TODO: Remove in 3.0
    org.springframework.kafka.transaction.ChainedKafkaTransactionManager.getResourceFactory()
    - in a future release KafkaAwareTransactionManager will not be a sub interface of ResourceTransactionManager. TODO: Remove in 3.0
    org.springframework.kafka.support.ProducerListener.isInterestedInSuccess()
    the result of this method will be ignored.
    org.springframework.kafka.core.DefaultKafkaProducerFactory.isRunning()
    Lifecycle is no longer implemented.
    org.springframework.kafka.test.utils.KafkaTestUtils.producerProps(KafkaEmbedded)
    since 2.2 in favor of KafkaTestUtils.producerProps(EmbeddedKafkaBroker)
    org.springframework.kafka.listener.adapter.MessagingMessageListenerAdapter.sendResponse(Object, String)
    in favor of MessagingMessageListenerAdapter.sendResponse(Object, String, Object, boolean).
    org.springframework.kafka.core.DefaultKafkaProducerFactory.start()
    Lifecycle is no longer implemented.
    org.springframework.kafka.core.DefaultKafkaProducerFactory.stop()
    Lifecycle is no longer implemented; use DefaultKafkaProducerFactory.reset() to close the Producer(s).
    org.springframework.kafka.test.rule.KafkaEmbedded.waitUntilSynced(String, int)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.springframework.kafka.listener.AbstractMessageListenerContainer(ContainerProperties)
    in favor of AbstractMessageListenerContainer.AbstractMessageListenerContainer(ConsumerFactory, ContainerProperties).
    org.springframework.kafka.event.ConsumerPausedEvent(Object, Collection<TopicPartition>)
    org.springframework.kafka.event.ConsumerResumedEvent(Object, Collection<TopicPartition>)
    org.springframework.kafka.event.ConsumerStoppedEvent(Object)
    org.springframework.kafka.event.ConsumerStoppingEvent(Object, Consumer<?, ?>, Collection<TopicPartition>)
    org.springframework.kafka.event.ContainerStoppedEvent(Object)
    org.springframework.kafka.event.KafkaEvent(Object)
    org.springframework.kafka.event.ListenerContainerIdleEvent(Object, long, String, Collection<TopicPartition>, Consumer<?, ?>)
    in favor of ListenerContainerIdleEvent.ListenerContainerIdleEvent(Object, long, String, Collection, Consumer, boolean)
    org.springframework.kafka.event.ListenerContainerIdleEvent(Object, long, String, Collection<TopicPartition>, Consumer<?, ?>, boolean)
    org.springframework.kafka.event.NonResponsiveConsumerEvent(Object, long, String, Collection<TopicPartition>, Consumer<?, ?>)
    org.springframework.kafka.config.StreamsBuilderFactoryBean(Map<String, Object>)
    in favor of StreamsBuilderFactoryBean.StreamsBuilderFactoryBean(KafkaStreamsConfiguration).
    org.springframework.kafka.config.StreamsBuilderFactoryBean(Map<String, Object>, CleanupConfig)
    in favor of StreamsBuilderFactoryBean.StreamsBuilderFactoryBean(KafkaStreamsConfiguration, CleanupConfig).
    org.springframework.kafka.config.StreamsBuilderFactoryBean(StreamsConfig)
    in favor of StreamsBuilderFactoryBean.StreamsBuilderFactoryBean(KafkaStreamsConfiguration)
    org.springframework.kafka.config.StreamsBuilderFactoryBean(StreamsConfig, CleanupConfig)
    in favor of StreamsBuilderFactoryBean.StreamsBuilderFactoryBean(KafkaStreamsConfiguration, CleanupConfig)
